title: Blended Learning Design Process for Remote Laboratory Instruction

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Weekend-intensive classes for employees, utilizing personal devices for experimental data collection and analysis.

learning_goals: Learners can independently plan and execute remote laboratory procedures in blended learning environments
Learners can complete laboratory reports through iterative improvements based on three or more feedback cycles
Learners can validate the scientific validity of experimental designs through peer assessment and expert review
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
